mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project ( project_id, project_no, project_nm, background, project_content, status_cd, deadline, priority, agent, sales_opportunity_id, contract_id, user_id) VALUES ( #{projectId},#{projectNo}, #{projectNm}, #{backGround}, #{projectContent}, #{status}, #{deadLine},#{priority}, #{agent}, #{opportunityId}, #{contractId}, #{userId} )
